articles.title: Bernie Sanders & Adam Schiff Express Solidarity With DGA As Contract Talks Begin Today - Deadline
articles.description: Sen. Bernie Sanders and California Congressman Adam Schiff tweeted out their support for the Directors Guild of America as it begins negotiations today for a new film and TV contract. “The 19,000-s…
articles.content:
Sen. Bernie Sanders and California Congressman Adam Schiff tweeted out their support for the Directors Guild of America as it begins negotiations today for a new film and TV contract.
